plot: This is a story about Luis, a middle-aged family man in Spain, caught up in that country's economic crisis. We watch to see if he will find a way out of his problems, we are reminded of the U.S. with 4 million long-term unemployed.
title: Domino: agarrado por la crisis
plot_es: This is a story about Luis, a middle-aged family man in Spain, caught up in that country's economic crisis. We watch to see if he will find a way out of his problems, we are reminded of the U.S. with 4 million long-term unemployed.
plot_en: This is a story about Luis, a middle-aged family man in Spain, caught up in that country's economic crisis. We watch to see if he will find a way out of his problems, we are reminded of the U.S. with 4 million long-term unemployed.
